CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - 1978 CODE
This table gives the location within this Code of those sections of the 1978 Code, as updated through May 13, 1997, which are included herein. Sections of the 1978 Code, as supplemented, not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded, obsolete or not of a general and permanent nature. For the location of ordinances adopted subsequent thereto, see the table immediately following this table.
EXPAND
